Usage Guidelines

Each color from the brand color palette is available as a variable when building Apollo UI with SCSS. Below are all the available shades for each color, including the variable name and value for each.

Primary Colors

$atmosphere-50
#ccecfe
$atmosphere-100
#98dafd
$atmosphere-200
#5ac5ff
$atmosphere-300
#32b5fc
$atmosphere-400
#2688bd
$atmosphere-500
#00507c
$atmosphere-600
#002c44
$water-50
#c9defe
$water-100
#94befe
$water-200
#599bff
$water-300
#297dfd
$water-400
#1f5ebe
$water-500
#153f7f
$water-600
#001e4c
$lavender-50
#f2dbff
$lavender-100
#c48be5
$lavender-200
#9b54c5
$lavender
#7f3ca7
$lavender-400
#682c8c
$lavender-500
#4f1671
$lavender-600
#27003e
